body.name: eazer Microfiber Mop Hardwood Floor Mop for Floor Cleaning-360 Rotating Dry mop Wet Mops for Cleaning with Adjustable Handle, Multifunction Mop for Hardwood,Marble,Tile Floor Mopping
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 57 mins
features: Convenient Buckle Design: With our floor mop, you can say goodbye to the hassle of traditional mop installation. Simply utilize the convenient buckle design to effortlessly attach and detach the dust mop or floor mop pad. Just press the button, lift the mop, and the bottom tray folds smoothly. Secure it in place by firmly pressing the buckle.

Versatile Wet and Dry Cleaning: Our microfiber mop is designed to handle all your cleaning needs. The floor mop is perfect for wet mopping, effectively tackling dirt, grime, and spills on various surfaces, including hardwood, laminate, vinyl, marble, and more. Meanwhile, the dust mop is ideal for dry cleaning, efficiently capturing dust, pet hair, and other debris.

Extendable and Lightweight Aluminum Handle: Experience cleaning convenience with our floor mop's extendable handle. Crafted from durable and corrosion-resistant aluminum, the handle can be easily adjusted to a maximum length of 51.2 inches. Its lightweight design ensures effortless maneuverability, making it suitable for users of all ages.

360° Rotating Head and Machine Washable Pads: Achieve a thorough clean with our floor mop's 360° rotating head, allowing you to effortlessly reach corners, tight spaces, and even walls. For added convenience, all four microfiber pads are super absorbent and machine washable, making maintenance a breeze.

eazer Excellent Customer Service - We are so confident in our product that we offer a 1 year replacement and 30 days money back protect in case something goes wrong with it! BUY NOW! Buy with Confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dust mop
reviews.reviewText: It is really easy to use. It gets under all the furniture and captures dust bunnies. You can do a quick wet mop in between regular cleanings. And the greatest news is all the pads are washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for floors with pets
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mop as a dry mop mainly to collect all the dog hair without having to vacuum all time. We also had construction done in the home recently and it was so helpful for dry mopping the dust off of the walls. Easy to clean as well. I just shake outside and then throw in the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job!
reviews.reviewText: This thing is very good at sweeping/dusting. Gets more than I knew was there! Also good for mopping. Only thing I would do differently is buy one with easier capacity to wring out or clean off dog hair. But thats on me, not the product! Otherwise does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mop heads.
reviews.reviewText: Great mop heads. Nice design. Just a little too short for tall people. I bought the product for the mop heads as a replacement for another mop I had purchased from the old Lumber liquidators so no loss on the short pole length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars eazer reputation is not an empty word
reviews.reviewText: The eazer Microfiber Mop is a versatile and efficient cleaning toolI am happy to say that the company behaved with the utmost integrity and showed care and respect for the customer.attentive and detailed attention to my previous product reviewthus again demonstrating that reputation is not an empty word.I received a full refund so I have no complaints or grievances with the product or the company.Overall, the eazer Microfiber Mop seems to deliver on its promises, offering quality cleaning performance and ease of use. Its durability and effectiveness make it a valuable addition to any household's cleaning arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good But Needs to Be Larger
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product mainly to use as a dry mop to pick up dog hair. While it picks up the dog hair well, it would be nicer if the mop was longer so I could pick up more hair and dust quicker.I do like that the mop bends in the middle. It makes it much easier to slide the different mop heads on and off. We had another mop that didn’t have this feature and it was a hassle changing the pad.I also like that the company includes more than one pad. A plus when one is in the wash and you can have a clean pad ready to go.
